snippet: At dawn on Thursday, an 18-foot-high ice sculpture of the Manhattan skyline (Snoopy included) appeared in Indianapolis. Amani Toomer was there to comment.
abstract: At dawn on Thursday, an 18-foot-high ice sculpture of the Manhattan skyline (Snoopy included) appeared in Indianapolis. Amani Toomer was there to comment.

headline.main: Everything Indy: For the New York Skyline, a Big Chill
headline.print_headline: Everything Indy: New York Skyline, On the Rocks
